item.title: NAHB 称美国住宅建筑商信心达到 7 月以来最高水平
item.description: 全美住宅建筑商协会周一表示，由于抵押贷款利率放缓以及在现房库存持续短缺的情况下定价环境改善，美国住宅建筑商的信心在 3 月份上升至 7 月份以来的最高水平。【原文：U.S. homebuilder confidence rose in March to the highest level since July due to easing mortgage rates and an improved pricing environment amid a continued existing home inventory shortage, the National Association of Home Builders said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国汽车工会称大众田纳西工厂工人申请参加工会选举
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（UAW）周一表示，大众汽车田纳西州查塔努加装配厂的工人正在寻求举行工会选举，这对 UAW 主席肖恩-费恩（Shawn Fain）为扩大工会在美国南部外资汽车制造商中的影响力而开展的史无前例的运动来说，是一次关键的考验。【原文：The United Auto Workers said Monday that workers at Volkswagen's Chattanooga, Tennessee, assembly plant are seeking an election to unionize, setting up a critical test for UAW President Shawn Fain's unprecedented campaign to expand the union's reach to foreign-owned automakers in the southern United States.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 埃克森美孚首席执行官表示无意收购赫斯公司
item.description: 埃克森美孚首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）周一表示，埃克森美孚正试图在与雪佛龙公司的纠纷中获得对赫斯公司圭亚那资产的优先购买权，而不是收购该公司本身。【原文：Exxon Mobil CEO Darren Woods on Monday said his company is trying to secure preemption rights over Hess Corp 's Guyana assets in its dispute with Chevron, not buy the company itself.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利预计，到 2024 年夏季，布伦特油价将攀升至 90 美元/桶
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）将 2024 年第三季度的布伦特油价预测上调了 10 美元/桶，至 90 美元/桶，理由是欧佩克+承诺的供需平衡趋紧，以及俄罗斯在最近炼油厂遭到无人机袭击后削减了石油产量。【原文：Morgan Stanley raised its Brent oil price forecasts by $10 per barrel to $90 for the third-quarter of 2024, citing tighter supply and demand balances on OPEC+ commitment and Russia's oil production curtailments after recent drone attacks on its refineries.】

item.title: 格拉斯-刘易斯支持迪士尼董事与对冲基金的董事会斗争
item.description: 代理咨询公司 Glass Lewis 周一敦促华特迪士尼的股东重新选举公司的所有董事会成员，这对 Trian Fund Management 和 Blackwells Capital 造成了打击，因为这两家对冲基金正在争夺这家娱乐巨头的董事会席位。【原文：Proxy advisory firm Glass Lewis on Monday urged Walt Disney shareholders to re-elect all company board members, dealing a blow to Trian Fund Management and Blackwells Capital as the hedge funds fight for board seats at the entertainment giant.】

item.title: 诺和诺德基金会将在丹麦境外提供更多资助
item.description: 丹麦肥胖症药品制造商诺和诺德公司的第一大股东诺和诺德基金会发言人周一表示，该基金会计划将更多的社会、科学和人道主义赠款用于丹麦以外的地区。【原文：The Novo Nordisk Foundation, top shareholder of Danish obesity drugmaker Novo Nordisk , plans to give a larger portion of its social, scientific and humanitarian grants outside of Denmark, a foundation spokesperson said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，美国正在探索向国防储备中添加更多的钴
item.description: 三位知情人士称，美国去年曾考虑购买钴用于国防储备，并补充说，尽管国防后勤局（DLA）在最新计划中决定不购买钴，但今后可能会考虑购买。【原文：The U.S. looked into buying cobalt for defence stockpiles last year, three sources with knowledge of the matter said, adding the Defense Logistics Agency (DLA) could consider purchases in future despite deciding against them in its latest plan.】

item.title: 中国监管机构将终身禁止恒大主席进入证券市场
item.description: 中国恒大集团旗下旗舰企业恒大地产周一表示，中国证券监管机构已对恒大集团董事长许家印处以罚款，并计划终身禁止其进入中国证券市场。【原文：China's securities regulator has fined China Evergrande Group's chairman Hui Ka Yan, and plans to ban him from entering the country's securities market for life over a series of rule violations, the company's flagship unit Hengda Real Estate said on Monday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，高盛高管斯蒂芬妮-科恩将加入 Cloudflare
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，高盛全球平台解决方案主管斯蒂芬妮-科恩（Stephanie Cohen）即将离开高盛，前往 Cloudflare 任职。【原文：Goldman Sachs' global head of platform solutions, Stephanie Cohen, is leaving the firm and will take up a position at Cloudflare, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司首席执行官誓言对近期安全事件进行审查
item.description: 美国联合航空公司首席执行官斯科特-柯比（Scott Kirby）周一表示，该公司正在对近期发生的安全事故进行审查，并利用审查结果更新员工安全培训和程序。【原文：United Airlines is reviewing recent safety incidents in which it has been involved and using the insights to update safety training and procedures for employees, CEO Scott Kirby said on Monday.】

item.title: 电动汽车初创企业菲斯科将融资最多 1.5 亿美元，并暂停生产
item.description: 菲斯科周一表示，将暂停生产电动汽车六周，并通过出售可转换票据筹集最多 1.5 亿美元资金，因为这家初创公司正试图应对资金紧张和汽车需求疲软的局面。【原文：Fisker said on Monday it would pause production of its electric vehicles for six weeks and raise up to $150 million in funding by selling convertible notes as the startup tries to navigate a cash crunch and weak demand for its cars.】

item.title: 利洁时称已对多家婴儿配方奶粉生产商提起诉讼
item.description: Reckitt 周一表示，针对一般婴儿配方奶粉生产商的案件很多，但不清楚有多少案件与该公司的 Enfamil 产品直接相关。【原文：Reckitt said on Monday that many cases had been filed against baby formula makers in general, but it was unclear how many directly related to its unit's Enfamil product.】

item.title: 惠誉称：UnitedHealth 部门遭黑客攻击可能打击小型药店和医疗服务提供商
item.description: 评级机构惠誉周一表示，联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）旗下技术部门 Change Healthcare 最近发生的网络安全事件可能会对使用其服务的小型医疗服务提供商和药店的信用状况产生负面影响。【原文：Ratings agency Fitch said on Monday the recent cybersecurity incident at UnitedHealth Group's technology unit, Change Healthcare, could negatively affect credit profiles of smaller healthcare providers and pharmacies that use its services.】

item.title: 对冲基金的流动 高盛称对冲基金购买了一年来最大规模的银行股
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）在一份报告中称，对冲基金以一年来最快的速度涌入银行和金融股，正好赶上欧洲和美国银行指数的高点。【原文：Hedge funds piled into bank and financials stocks at the fastest pace in a year, Goldman Sachs said in a note, just in time to catch highs seen European and U.S. banking indices.】

item.title: 纳斯达克称影响连接的问题已解决
item.description: 纳斯达克周一表示，已经解决了影响交易所连接的问题，所有系统运行正常。【原文：Nasdaq said on Monday it had resolved issues impacting connectivity at the exchange, and all systems were operating normally.】

item.title: 阿斯利康将把美国吸入器的自付费用上限定为 35 美元
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca）周一表示，将从 6 月起把其治疗慢性肺病和哮喘的吸入式呼吸道产品在美国的自付费用上限定为每月 35 美元。【原文：AstraZeneca said on Monday it would cap out-of-pocket costs for its inhaled respiratory products for chronic lung disease and asthma to $35 per month, starting June, in the United States.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司预计 2024 年交付量和收入将增长
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周一表示，预计 2024 年该公司的飞机交付量和收入都将增长。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer expects both its aircraft deliveries and revenues to grow in 2024, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 坚挺的通胀可能成为美联储会议宽松时间表的一张 "意外牌
item.description: 人们普遍预计，美国联邦储备委员会在周三结束为期两天的会议时将维持利率不变，但决策者们可能会对顽固的通胀表现出更多的担忧，并对今年任何宽松政策的时机和程度发出更加鹰派的信号。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve is widely expected to keep rates unchanged when it ends its two-day meeting on Wednesday, but policy makers could show more concern about stubborn inflation and present more hawkish signals about the timing and extent of any easing this year.】

item.title: 美国气候法规将促进可持续会计行业发展
item.description: 高管和分析师表示，美国新的气候披露法规应会增加对四大会计师事务所和更专业的审查人员服务的需求，并可能加剧两大阵营之间的竞争。【原文：New U.S. climate-disclosure regulations should boost demand for services of the Big Four accounting firms and more specialized reviewers, and could sharpen a rivalry between the two camps, executives and analysts said.】

item.title: 超微计算机借人工智能服务器热潮跻身标普 500 指数
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）将于本周一加入S&P 500指数，它在试图利用人工智能生成热潮的服务器制造商中享有罕见的优势--与英伟达（Nvidia）的密切关系有助于它比竞争对手戴尔和惠普企业公司更快地推出产品。【原文：Super Micro Computer, which joins the S&P 500 on Monday, enjoys a rare advantage among server makers that are trying to tap the generative AI boom - close ties with Nvidia that help it launch products faster than rivals Dell and Hewlett Packard Enterprise.】

item.title: 苹果公司在批评声中表示遵守欧盟《数字市场法
item.description: 苹果公司周一回击了有关其在按照欧盟《数字市场法案》的要求开放其封闭的生态系统方面做得不够的批评，称其已经遵守了这项具有里程碑意义的立法。【原文：Apple on Monday fended off criticism that it has not done enough to open up its closed eco-system as required under the European Union's Digital Markets Act, saying it has complied with the landmark legislation.】

item.title: 戴姆勒客车希望从 2025 年起实现雄心勃勃的利润目标
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车公司周一为其客车部门制定了新的宏伟目标，现在计划从明年起将调整后的销售回报率提高到 8%，到 2030 年提高到 9%。【原文：Daimler Truck set new ambitious targets for its bus division on Monday, now guiding for adjusted return on sales to rise to 8% from next year and to 9% by 2030.】

item.title: 最高法院审查美国政府与社交媒体平台的联系
item.description: 美国最高法院周一再次介入社交媒体内容节制之争，以言论自由为由质疑乔-拜登总统的政府如何鼓励平台删除联邦官员认为是错误信息的帖子，包括有关选举和 COVID-19 的帖子。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday marches back into the battle over social media content moderation in a challenge on free speech grounds to how President Joe Biden's administration encouraged platforms to remove posts that federal officials deemed misinformation, including about elections and COVID-19.】

item.title: 早间交易中国绿芽提振利率和油价
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 备受瞩目的对冲基金经理为 2024 年的基金发行排兵布阵
item.description: 研究公司 PivotalPath 和其他主要经纪人及业内人士表示，预计今年将有 40 家价值数十亿美元的公司的前投资组合经理高调推出对冲基金。【原文：A bumper crop of 40 high-profile hedge fund launches by former portfolio managers of multi-billion dollar firms is expected this year, said research firm PivotalPath and other prime broker and industry sources.】

item.title: 聚焦：美国富人让高端房车公司持续发展
item.description: 大多数美国休闲车--这些公路上的庞然大物通常都像不小心冲出铁轨的箱式汽车--都是从印第安纳州埃尔克哈特灰暗环境中的粗陋工厂里生产出来的，目的是满足大部分中等收入客户的流浪癖。【原文：Most U.S. recreational vehicles - those behemoths of the roadway often resembling box cars that accidentally wandered off the rails - roll out of gritty factories in the gray environs of Elkhart, Indiana, and aim to satisfy the wanderlust of largely middle-income customers.】

item.title: 英伟达人工智能开发者大会拉开帷幕，新芯片成为焦点
item.description: 人工智能半导体巨头英伟达（Nvidia）周一将举行年度开发者大会，投资者将重点关注首席执行官黄仁勋在下午的主题演讲中发布的新芯片。【原文：Artificial intelligence semiconductor powerhouse Nvidia kicks off its annual developer conference on Monday, with investors focused on new chip announcements from Chief Executive Jensen Huang in an afternoon keynote address.】

item.title: 现金枯竭，欧洲初创企业转向日益复杂的债务交易
item.description: 参与交易的人士告诉路透社，欧洲风险资本支持的公司正在签署越来越复杂的可转换债务交易，这些交易有可能给投资者带来更大的控制权或更多的回报。【原文：European venture capital-backed companies are signing up to increasingly complex convertible debt deals which risk giving investors more control or bigger payouts further down the road, people involved in the deals told Reuters.】

item.title: 纳斯达克称正在调查影响连接性的匹配引擎问题
item.description: 交易所运营商纳斯达克周一表示，正在调查与匹配引擎有关的问题，这些问题影响了与交易所的连接。【原文：Exchange operator Nasdaq said on Monday it was investigating issues related to the matching engine that was impacting connectivity to the exchange.】

item.title: 在美联储会议和人工智能大会召开前，标普 500 指数和纳斯达克指数期货微涨
item.description: 在美联储本周召开会议之前，跟踪 S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数的期货周一上涨，预计美联储将在此次会议上保持借贷成本稳定，并就其今年的货币政策路径提供线索。【原文：Futures tracking the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq rose on Monday ahead of the Federal Reserve's meeting this week, where it is expected to keep borrowing costs steady and provide cues on its monetary policy path this year.】
